title: Star Guardian Quiz - Emblem not received.
body:
Title states it. 
I took the quiz and as I finished, my browser crashed along with my client.
I thought that was weird, so I took the test again, it told me that I had already redeemed my reward for taking the quiz.

Was there someway I was supposed to get it, or is this a bug?

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, the icons for these can take a bit to get to you, and we made sure the surveys stated this at the end as an attempt to prevent confusion.

Let me know if you have any questions.
The icon can take a few days to be added to your account.
It's been over three days and I think the event ended by now and I still haven't gotten mine.

Sorry about that, I didn't even check boards again. Thank you though, I just received it. I didn't know it said that, because when I finished the quiz everything just froze on me. (Browser & League Client crashed)

Thanks again though. Problem resolved itself.
